Docs.summary: A Class representing a SqlServerJobStep along with the instance operations that can be performed on it. If you have a you can construct a from an instance of using the GetSqlServerJobStepResource method. Otherwise you can get one from its parent resource using the GetSqlServerJobStep method.

Docs.summary:
Deletes a job step. This will implicitly create a new job version.
Request Path/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.Sql/servers/{serverName}/jobAgents/{jobAgentName}/jobs/{jobName}/steps/{stepName}

Default Api Version2020-11-01-preview
